pageContext.name: Jun: Dudu for Home is here!

sections.label: Jun: Dudu for Home is here!Â
sections.description:
Say hello to the new Dudu for Home! CommonTown has developed the programme for home users by popular demand. Students can improve their learning of the Chinese language at home in a fast and engaging way.



Besides more than 400+ animated Chinese story books, the programme comes with a fresh new interface with built-in flash card vocabulary list and exciting interactive learning games.  



Visit dudu.town to find out more about Dudu for Home. For subscription enquiries regarding Dudu for Home drop us an e-mail at info@dudu.town, or call our hotline at +65 6848 8900.
